price: 53. Ils te réclament de hâter le supplice. N’eût été le terme déjà nommé, le supplice se serait déjà abattu sur eux. Il les frappera certes sans prévenir et sans qu’ils ne le sentent (venir).
arabic: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَوۡلَآ أَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى لَّجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ وَلَيَأۡتِيَنَّهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayastaʿjilūnaka bil-ʿadhābi walawlā ajalun musamman lajāahumu al-ʿadhābu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
translations: And they ask you to hasten
But it will surely come to them
